full_summary:
**Tender Notice: Refit of CCGS J.P. Tully**
======================================================

**Reference Number:** WS3835828390-Doc3841846585
**Publication Date:** January 24, 2023
**Closing Date:** February 23, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) and the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is soliciting proposals for the refit of the CCGS John P. Tully. The project involves undertaking the alongside refit of the vessel, including all necessary maintenance and repairs.

**Tender Details:**

* Sourcing strategy: Western Canada suppliers only
* Work commencement date: March 22, 2023
* Expected completion date: April 17, 2023
* Solicitation method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Evaluation criteria: Lowest price
* Notice type: Request for Proposal

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Eric Zwarich, Phone: (insert phone number)

**Notice URL:**

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15215628?extsite=MTUyMTU2MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Bidder Instructions:**

* See Part 2 of the bid documents for detailed instructions

**Tender Description:**

The CCGS John P. Tully refit project requires a supplier to provide all necessary materials, services, and labor to carry out the refit works. The successful bidder will be required to attend a bidder's conference and site visit, if elected. If you are interested in submitting a proposal, please ensure you have carefully read and understood the tender documentation, including the bid instructions.

**Language of the Tender:**

The official language of the tender is English. Late submissions will not be accepted. The PSPC reserves the right to reject any and all submissions.
